7.text: extraordinary people. Politicians and celebrities are also interviewed by me. With all this work, sometimes, the letters and e-mails sent to me are also answered by me. Every day is different and new to me.

9.text: Listening Listen to your teacher and draw a picture of your village.

10.text: Activity 6.9 Recite this poem aloud and improve your pronunciation.

12.text: Macau, the City of Dreams, rich in history and traditions with streets lined by colourful constructions,

13.text: left behind by people who made many thousand-mile trips

15.text: Macau, the City of Dreams, full of wonderful attractions of a grand mix of architectural creations,

16.text: brought to us by people who travelled long distance for a brave new world of abundance.

17.text: Macau, the City of Dreams, never short of pedestrian zones in winding city streets paved in cobblestones,

18.text: where no traffic is ever allowed to invade,

19.text: and the quiet, peaceful nature trails that gives a taste of Macau’s rustic charms and details.
